publicly.translation[0].definitions[0].d: in a way that is intended for anyone to know, see, or hear
publicly.translation[0].definitions[0].e: She and her family agreed never to discuss the matter publicly.
publicly.translation[0].definitions[1].d: done or controlled by the government
publicly.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a company that is publicly owned has sold its shares to people who are not part of the company
publicly.translation[0].definitions[3].d: involving the ordinary people in a country or city
publicly.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if a company is publicly held or publicly owned, or its shares are publicly traded, its shares are available to be bought and sold by investors
